programme.desc: The Burger Kitchen (Part 2/2): In the second half of a two-part Nightmare in LA, can Gordon Ramsay bring together the fragmented Saffron family and save their failing restaurant?

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Tony and Diane's wedding is fast approaching. But Tony's got plenty of distractions to work his way through first, including pacifying a demanding Marie and a nostalgia-filled stag do.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Luigi's: Gordon Ramsay travels to Orange County, Southern California, to try to save Italian restaurant Luigi's from disaster.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Park's Edge: In Atlanta, Gordon helps first-time restaurant owners Richard and Jorge, whose establishment is in trouble due to their constant fighting, poor food and bad vibes.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: In an egg-ceptional Bake Off first, it's Meringue Week, and the bakers whisk up tarts, souffls and ice cream cake. Who can keep their cool? Whose souffl will be in disarray?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: The final newly-weds embark on their honeymoons! Meanwhile, a badly behaved husband receives a warning, and will physical intimacy lead to a deeper connection?

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: At the third dinner party, confessions are served with a side dish of jealousy, as one bride comes clean and a new bride's arrival and antics stir the group.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Commitment Ceremony time... it's serving decisions as one couple seriously consider the future of their marriage, while another make some much-needed progress.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Will absence make the heart grow fonder on the days out? Not for one groom, who confesses his true feelings. And a long-hidden secret causes an explosive clash.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3
programme.desc: (2018) Spooky animated family comedy. On a monster-friendly cruise, Dracula (Adam Sandler) falls in love - with a vampire slayer!

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of...
programme.desc: ...Unfortunate Events: (2004) Gothic family comedy starring Jim Carrey as the evil, scheming Count Olaf, who'll do whatever it takes to deprive three young orphans of their inheritance.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Girls Just Want to Have Sums: When Principal Skinner gets cancelled for sexism, the school gets a new principal who mollycoddles the girls. So Lisa disguises herself as a boy.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Waverly Hills, 9-0-2-1-D'oh: The family rent a flat in the affluent Waverly Hills area so that Bart and Lisa can get into a good school.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: I Won't Be Home for Christmas: When Moe convinces Homer to stay out late on Christmas Eve, Marge kicks him out of the house and he has to spend Christmas alone.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Man Who Came to Be Dinner: A new amusement park ride transports the Simpsons to Kang and Kodos's home planet, where they're held captive in a zoo.

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Feelings flourish for some couples as Love/Hate Week gets underway. But love languishes and emotions erupt when one groom hears his wife's critiques.

programme.title: New: MAFS UK: It's Official!...
programme.desc: ...With Lucinda Light: Brand new series - Lucinda's joined by Donna Preston. With three commitment ceremonies left, it's make-or-break. And bride Leah chats about causing chaos!

programme.title: Virgin Island
programme.desc: As the course approaches its climax, it's time for the group to learn about masturbation and how to have an orgasm. Zac finds out the hard way that sex can be complicated. (Ep5)

programme.title: Oblivion
programme.desc: (2013) Sci-fi action-mystery set on a war-ravaged planet Earth that's been largely abandoned by humanity. With Tom Cruise, Andrea Riseborough, Olga Kurylenko and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Feelings flourish for some couples as Love/Hate Week gets underway. But love languishes and emotions erupt when one groom hears his wife's critiques.

programme.title: Below Deck Sailing Yacht
programme.desc: Out, Damned Spot: Captain Glenn doesn't let anyone off the hook when the crew get a bit rowdy during their night off. And a familiar face rejoins the crew...

programme.title: The Neighborhood
programme.desc: Welcome to Grover's Birthday: When Dave and Gemma's elaborate plans for Grover's seventh birthday party go awry, Malcolm and Marty come to the rescue.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Tony and Diane's wedding is fast approaching. But Tony's got plenty of distractions to work his way through first, including pacifying a demanding Marie and a nostalgia-filled stag do.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: It's back to the 90s for Tony's stag do, with a bunch of old faces from his youth returning to the village. And love is in the air for another iconic couple.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As Tony's wedding day approaches, a cloud hangs over the Blakes and the village with Jez missing. Darren's bad decisions lead him into an underworld of secrets and danger.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The Greek at the Harbor: Gordon Ramsay helps a family-run Greek restaurant turn its fortunes around in Ventura Harbor in California. But he uncovers a shocking family secret...

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Feelings flourish for some couples as Love/Hate Week gets underway. But love languishes and emotions erupt when one groom hears his wife's critiques.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Alone Again Natura-Diddily: When tragedy strikes Maude Flanders at Springfield's new race track, the Simpsons must help a bereft Ned.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Missionary: Impossible: Homer pledges $10,000 to save his favourite British sitcom, Do Shut Up. But when the channel comes for the cash, he flees to a South Pacific island.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Friendship Turbulence: In an attempt to improve their strained friendship, Howard invites Sheldon to visit NASA with him. Penny is upset when her car breaks down.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Mommy Observation: Sheldon pays a surprise visit to his mother in Houston and is forced to confront a new reality. Raj throws a murder mystery-themed dinner party.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Me? Jealous?: Phil is so preoccupied with impressing his new business partner, Tad, that he doesn't notice when Claire thinks that Tad is being inappropriate with her.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Aunt Mommy: After selling a house to Mitch and Cam's friends, Phil and Claire take them out for a celebratory dinner but get drunk and overshare.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Dependence Transcendence: Tensions rise when the guys struggle to complete their Air Force project on time and are forced to work around the clock.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cohabitation Experimentation: When Amy's flat is flooded, she has to move out while it is being repaired and proposes a 'cohabitation experiment' with Sheldon.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hot Tub Contamination: Leonard and Penny intervene when Sheldon and Amy have an argument. Howard and Bernadette are disturbed by unexpected guests.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Fetal Kick Catalyst: Penny meets her fans at a comic book convention. Sheldon and Amy host brunch at Penny's flat. Howard makes an impulsive purchase.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Golden Child: Peralta helps Santiago navigate her complicated relationship with her brother. Boyle introduces theatre into an undercover mission.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Gintars: Boyle and Peralta investigate Nikolaj's family. Holt and Santiago bring in forensic scientist Dr Yee to help Diaz close a difficult murder case.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Whistler's Father: Maggie reveals a hidden talent, which Grampa tries to exploit. Marge gets a job as a decorator for the mob.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr. Lisa's Opus: In her Harvard application, 18-year-old Lisa recounts the story of her childhood - including the time when Marge planned to leave Homer...

programme.title: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: Feelings flourish for some couples as Love/Hate Week gets underway. But love languishes and emotions erupt when one groom hears his wife's critiques.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Gyroscopic Collapse: Amy is offered a fellowship at Princeton, Raj makes new living arrangements, and the guys' gyroscope project spins out of control.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Long Distance Dissonance: The gang worry when Sheldon's former admirer, Dr Ramona Nowitzki, turns up while Amy is away working at Princeton.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Regarding Margie: Marge inhales poisonous fumes during a cleaning spree, gets amnesia and forgets who Homer is.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Treehouse of Horror VII: Bart finds his evil twin in the attic, Lisa becomes God to a race of tiny people, and Kang and Kodos assume the identities of Bill Clinton and Bob Dole.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: As Hollyoaks enters its 30th birthday week, longest-serving resident Tony prepares to marry Diane. But secrets threaten to turn his dream day into one nobody will ever forget...

programme.title: Hollyoaks at 30: Most Explosive...
programme.desc: ...Episodes: Another classic episode, for Hollyoaks' 30th anniversary. Romeo professes his love for Lily. Diane tells Tony she still loves him and is willing to give things a second try.

programme.title: Supercruising: Life at Sea
programme.desc: A peek through the portholes onboard two of Holland America's luxurious cruise ships. Setting sail from Florida, passengers enjoy their first stop: a private island in the Bahamas. (Ep1)

programme.title: New: Married at First Sight UK
programme.desc: Brand new series: It's another dinner party and It. Is. Serving! Progress is on the menu for some but one couple's authenticity is called into question. Did anyone order tension?

programme.title: New: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Brand new series: Alice and Sam Vanderpump nervously plan to tell Sam's aunt - the formidable Lisa Vanderpump - about their pregnancy. Jazz uncovers a shocking secret.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: (2019) Luc Besson's action thriller about a young Russian assassin, with Sasha Luss. A scout offers Anna an opportunity to become a model in Paris, but can she escape her links to the KGB?

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: (2021) Horror with Ethan Hawke. Denver 1974 and The Grabber is snatching boys from the street. But he doesn't reckon on two kids with uncanny abilities who refuse to do as they're told.

programme.title: Berberian Sound Studio
programme.desc: (2012) Psychodrama with Toby Jones. An Englishman is hired to create sound effects for a horror film studio in 1970s Rome. But the job takes a heavy toll on him...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: (1996) Brian Levant's festive all-action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger is on a mission to get his son (Jake Lloyd) the must-have Christmas toy, Turbo Man. But it's sold out everywhere...

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: (1997) Family fantasy comedy-adventure starring Jim Broadbent and Celia Imrie. A family of miniscule people live beneath the floorboards of a regular-sized family's house.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: (1998) Charming family comedy sequel. The farm's in trouble and only a sheep-herding pig can save the day. But after a customs mix-up, Babe ends up in a boarding house for lost animals...

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the...
programme.desc: ...Neighborhood: (2019) Biographical drama starring Tom Hanks as 'Mister' Rogers, the much-loved host of a kids TV show, who becomes the subject of a cynical journalist's article on heroes.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: (2018) High-octane sci-fi action adventure starring Hailee Steinfeld. When Charlie drives home a clapped-out VW Beetle, she gets more than she bargained for: a huge robotic alien.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about making their Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: (2017) Fantasy adventure starring Matt Damon and Willem Dafoe. In 11th-century China, Europeans seeking the secret of gunpowder are caught up in a war against alien monsters.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk
programme.desc: (2016) Wild West horror starring Kurt Russell, Lili Simmons, Patrick Wilson, Richard Jenkins and Matthew Fox. Can a posse save townsfolk from their cannibalistic abductors?

programme.title: In Fear
programme.desc: (2013) Psychological horror with Iain De Caestecker and Alice Englert. A couple get lost in remote rural lanes as they drive to a music festival. Frustration turns to fear as dusk falls...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out...
programme.desc: ...of Water: (2015) Surreal animated adventure. When the recipe for Mr Krabs' Krabby Patties vanishes, Bikini Bottom is plunged into anarchy. So SpongeBob sets out to put things right.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: (2019) Touching comedy-drama. An ageing golden retriever (voiced by Kevin Costner) tells the story of his life with his best pal, a budding Formula 1 driver.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: (1954) Western with Robert Mitchum and Marilyn Monroe. An ex-con and a saloon singer steer a raft through hostile territory to face a showdown with her crooked fianc. With Rory Calhoun.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: (1990) Classic family comedy starring Macaulay Culkin. A boy's parents forget to take him on holiday with them. Then two inept burglars turn up. Can our resourceful young hero outwit them?

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: (2022) Darkly-tinged but ultimately feel-good comedy starring Tom Hanks as a grumpy misanthrope who spends his time badgering people into following society's rules. But why is he like this?

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: (2019) Comedy drama starring Sharon Horgan and Kristin Scott Thomas. A group of military wives overcome their personal differences to form an unforgettable choir.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: (2011) Existentialist comedy-drama. Miranda July and Hamish Linklater play a couple whose directionless lives take an unexpected turn when they adopt a cat. Sex/strong language.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Sign2Win
programme.desc: Five daunting games and only one winning team... Will it be close friends Steve and Joe; Moona and Stephen or Amy and her father Rodney taking home 1,000?

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Ride Lonesome
programme.desc: (1959) Western. Randolph Scott plays a bounty hunter who has unfinished business with the brother of his latest target. But his quest for revenge looks like it could be undermined.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: (1954) Tough western. A cavalry doctor (Robert Francis) discovers a Native American tribe is dying of malaria, but his by-the-book captain (Phil Carey) refuses to allow their treatment.

programme.title: Yesterday's Enemy
programme.desc: (1959) Wartime drama with Stanley Baker. The captain of a British army patrol deciphers secret enemy battle plans, but does so at a great moral cost.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
